exercises.name: Ankle Mobility Hold
exercises.notes: Hold the end range gently and keep your heel planted.

exercises.name: Banded Terminal Knee Extension
exercises.notes: Squeeze into full extension against the band, then return smoothly.

exercises.name: Single-Leg Bridge
exercises.notes: Drive through the heel and keep your pelvis level.

exercises.name: Lateral Step-Over
exercises.notes: Step sideways over a low obstacle with controlled foot placement.
